rules.description: 🕱⃣ Diacritics cheat sheet: ⌃; ⟶ ⌃; + notification via AppleScript

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'display notification "q◌̆  r◌̊  u◌̣  i◌̇  o◌̄       g◌̨  h◌̋  j◌̉  k.⃣  ;◌̈  ''◌̛
`◌̀  z◌̧  v◌̌  n◌̃  /◌́   (🕱Diacritics)" with title "`◌̀  1◌́  2◌̀  3◌̈  4◌̃  5◌̄  6◌̂  7◌̊  8◌̇  9◌̆  0◌̌  -◌̣  =◌̧"'

osascript -e 'display notification "й◌̆  к◌̊  г◌̣  ш◌̇  щ◌̄       п◌̨  р◌̋  о◌̉  л.⃣  ж◌̈  э◌̛
]◌̀  я◌̧  м◌̌  т◌̃  /◌́   (🕱Diacritics)" with title "`◌̀  1◌́  2◌̀  3◌̈  4◌̃  5◌̄  6◌̂  7◌̊  8◌̇  9◌̆  0◌̌  -◌̣  =◌̧"'

rules.description: 🕱⃣ Diacritics cheat sheet: ⌃' ⟶ ⌃' + notification via AppleScript

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'display notification "q◌̆  r◌̊  u◌̣  i◌̇  o◌̄       g◌̨  h◌̋  j◌̉  k.⃣  ;◌̈  ''◌̛
`◌̀  z◌̧  v◌̌  n◌̃  /◌́   (🕱Diacritics)" with title "`◌̀  1◌́  2◌̀  3◌̈  4◌̃  5◌̄  6◌̂  7◌̊  8◌̇  9◌̆  0◌̌  -◌̣  =◌̧"'

osascript -e 'display notification "й◌̆  к◌̊  г◌̣  ш◌̇  щ◌̄       п◌̨  р◌̋  о◌̉  л.⃣  ж◌̈  э◌̛
]◌̀  я◌̧  м◌̌  т◌̃  /◌́   (🕱Diacritics)" with title "`◌̀  1◌́  2◌̀  3◌̈  4◌̃  5◌̄  6◌̂  7◌̊  8◌̇  9◌̆  0◌̌  -◌̣  =◌̧"'

rules.description: 🕱⃣ space cheat sheet: ⌃␠ ⟶ ⌃␠ + notification via AppleScript

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'display notification " en⃣ em⃣ no-b⃣reak(narrow)  0⃣z⃣ero-width
f⃣igure  h⃣air t⃣hin  .⃣p⃣unctuation  wordj⃣oiner" with title "u⃣␣  s⃣␠  -⃣no-break -  ␠⃣no-break (🕱space)"'

osascript -e 'display notification " т⃣н⃣en ь⃣м⃣em и⃣no-break(nrw)  0⃣я⃣zero-width
а⃣ф⃣figure  в⃣р⃣hair е⃣thin  ю⃣з⃣punct  о⃣w-joiner" with title "г⃣у⃣␣  ы⃣с⃣␠  -⃣no-break -  ␠⃣no-break  (🕱␠)"'

rules.description: 🕱⃣ Copyright cheat sheet: ⌥c ⟶ ⌥c + notification via AppleScript

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "o(ɔ)  l🄯  p℗  s℠  (🕱Copyright)" with title "c©  r®  t™"'
osascript -e 'display notification "щ,о(ɔ)  л,д🄯  з℗  ы℠  (🕱Copyright)" with title "с©  к,р®  е,т™"'
